name: OPX Finance
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
OPX is a fork from GMX.IO - a new kind of Decentralized Exchange designed to provide a large range of trading features and very deep liquidity on many large-cap crypto assets.
OPX is a decentralized spot and perpetual exchange that supports low swap fees and zero price impact trades on the Optimism chain. This protocol is promised to become the next giant, bringing enormous benefits to its users and DarkCrypto Foundation Ecosystem as a hold.
